report.name: x_reshist

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT rpad(s.ident,5,' ') IDENT, rpad(nvl(r.rnom,' '),30,' ') NOM, rpad(nvl(r.rprenom,' '),15,' ') PRENOM, rpad(s.CODSG,7,' ') CODSG, rpad(s.SOCCODE,4,' ') SOCCODE, rpad(to_char(s.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy'),10,' ') DATSITU, rpad(NVL(to_char(s.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),' '),10,' ') DATDEP, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Janvier, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Fevrier, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Mars, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Avril, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Mai, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Juin, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Juillet, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Aout, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Septembre, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Octobre, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Novembre, rpad( DECODE(pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident),-1,'pas de situ',-2,NULL,pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)) ,11,' ') Decembre FROM SITU_RESS s, datdebex d, ressource r, STRUCT_INFO str WHERE s.prestation not in ('GRA','INT','STA','IFO','MO ','SLT') AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(s.DATDEP,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') >= '01/01/2008' OR s.DATDEP IS NULL) AND r.ident=s.ident AND (s.ident, s.datsitu) in (SELECT sr.ident, max(sr.datsitu) FROM SITU_RESS sr group by ident) AND s.codsg=str.codsg AND (pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 OR pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois('12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4),s.ident)=0 ) &P_WHERE ORDER BY s.ident;

dataDescriptor.expression: rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

rpad ( DECODE ( pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) , - 1 , 'pas de situ' , - 2 , NULL , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_mois ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , s.ident ) ) , 11 , ' ' )

function.name: afterform
